title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration with the local LLM server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python scripts and applications.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, providing a standardized interface to use Ollama models within LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source web UI for Ollama featuring a ChatGPT-like interface, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama, enabling JVM applications to interact with local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion and chat via Ollama directly into the editor.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of community-maintained CLI utilities for managing Ollama models, logs, and performance monitoring.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Streamlit-based chatbot UI that connects to Ollama, offering session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript bindings to the Ollama REST API with TypeScript support.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to integrate Ollama LLMs into scripts and applications.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama4j, enabling rapid local LLM integration in Java web apps.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that leverages Ollama for on-server private LLM chat and moderation.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin multiplatform client for Ollama supporting JVM, Android, and native targets.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama’s HTTP API with GenServer-based process management for fault-tolerant apps.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart client for Ollama, enabling Flutter apps to run local LLMs on desktop and mobile.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.
